title: A single-electrode mode triboelectric nanogenerator based on natural leaves for harvesting energy
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2743-2750
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00177J, Paper
Peng Zhang, Xiaofei Bu, Liangsong Huang, Yuxia Li, Zhongkai Zhao, Ranran Yang, Liqun Yang, Kun Zhang
This work reports a single-electrode mode triboelectric nanogenerator (G-TENG) based on natural leaf as the friction layer for application in the field of outdoor self-power supply.
